function.name: setCallBackInfo
function.description: Set callback method for node selection and double click
function.summary: Set callback method for node selection and double click

function.name: setCheckBoxValueDataprovider
function.description: Set checkbox value dataprovider. Dataprovider returns INTEGER (0 or 1) or STRING (false or true)
function.summary: Set checkbox value dataprovider.

function.name: setChildSortDataprovider
function.description: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve column name and sort order for the child nodes.\nThe provided data must be a string of form : column_name_used_for_sort sort_order(asc or desc)
function.summary: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve column name and sort order for the child nodes.

function.name: setConfigurationDataprovider
function.description: Set configuration dataprovider. Dataprovider must be MEDIA type and returns a configuration object
function.summary: Set configuration dataprovider.

function.name: setFontTypeDataprovider
function.description: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve the node font from
function.summary: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve the node font from

function.name: setHasCheckBoxDataprovider
function.description: Set has checkbox flag dataprovider. Dataprovider returns INTEGER (0 / 1 / 2) or STRING (false / true / disabled) for (does not have / have / have but disabled)
function.summary: Set has checkbox flag dataprovider.

function.name: setImageMediaDataprovider
function.description: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve the node image from (blob column)
function.summary: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve the node image from (blob column)

function.name: setImageURLDataprovider
function.description: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve the node image from (via url)
function.summary: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve the node image from (via url)

function.name: setMRelationDataprovider
function.description: Set m-relation dataprovider. Dataprovider returns the name of the m-relation
function.summary: Set m-relation dataprovider.

function.name: setMRelationName
function.description: Set m-relation name
function.summary: Set m-relation name

function.name: setMethodToCallOnCheckBoxChange
function.description: Set method to call on check box status change
function.summary: Set method to call on check box status change

function.name: setMethodToCallOnClick
function.description: Set method to call on click.\nThe callback will be called with the following arguments : returnDataprovider, tableName, mouseX, mouseY
function.summary: Set method to call on click.

function.name: setMethodToCallOnDoubleClick
function.description: Set method to call on double click.\nThe callback will be called with the following arguments : returnDataprovider, tableName, mouseX, mouseY
function.summary: Set method to call on double click.

function.name: setMethodToCallOnRightClick
function.description: Set method to call on right click.\nThe callback will be called with the following arguments : returnDataprovider, tableName, mouseX, mouseY
function.summary: Set method to call on right click.

function.name: setNRelationDataprovider
function.description: Set n-relation dataprovider. Dataprovider returns the name of the n-relation
function.summary: Set n-relation dataprovider.

function.name: setNRelationInfos
function.description: Set n-relation infos (array of RelationInfo objects created using tree.createRelationInfo() for having multiple child relations for one node)
function.summary: Set n-relation infos (array of RelationInfo objects created using tree.

function.name: setNRelationName
function.description: Set n-relation name
function.summary: Set n-relation name

function.name: setTextDataprovider
function.description: Set text dataprovider
function.summary: Set text dataprovider

function.name: setToolTipTextDataprovider
function.description: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve the node tooltiptext from
function.summary: Set the dataprovider name to retrieve the node tooltiptext from

function.name: setDataprovider
function.description: Set column dataprovider
function.summary: Set column dataprovider

function.name: setHeader
function.description: Set column header text
function.summary: Set column header text

property.name: selectionPath
property.description: Get/Set the selection (path), array with pk records values (only single pk key supported)
property.summary: Get/Set the selection (path), array with pk records values (only single pk key supported)

function.name: addRoots
function.return: The number of added root nodes
function.description: Add foundset to the list of foundsets used to create the tree's root nodes.\nNote: the bean will use a clone of the foundset, so any changes on the foundset parameter will be ignored in the tree.
function.summary: Add foundset to the list of foundsets used to create the tree's root nodes.

function.name: bindNodeFontTypeDataProvider
function.description: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance
function.summary: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance

function.name: bindNodeImageMediaDataProvider
function.description: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance
function.summary: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance

function.name: bindNodeImageURLDataProvider
function.description: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance
function.summary: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance

function.name: bindNodeTooltipTextDataProvider
function.description: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance
function.summary: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance

function.name: createBinding
function.return: Binding object for a database table
function.description: Create and add binding object for a database table used to set data bindings for nodes.
function.summary: Create and add binding object for a database table used to set data bindings for nodes.

function.name: createColumn
function.description: Create and add new column to the tree table
function.summary: Create and add new column to the tree table

function.name: createColumn
function.description: Create and add new column to the tree table
function.summary: Create and add new column to the tree table

function.name: createRelationInfo
function.description: Create relation info object used to set multiple child relations for a tree node
function.summary: Create relation info object used to set multiple child relations for a tree node

function.name: getHeight
function.description: Returns the height of the tree.
function.summary: Returns the height of the tree.

function.name: getLocationX
function.description: Get the x coordinate of the location of the tree.
function.summary: Get the x coordinate of the location of the tree.

function.name: getLocationY
function.description: Get the y coordinate of the location of the tree.
function.summary: Get the y coordinate of the location of the tree.

function.name: getName
function.description: Returns the name of the tree.
function.summary: Returns the name of the tree.

function.name: getWidth
function.description: Returns the width of the tree.
function.summary: Returns the width of the tree.

function.name: isNodeExpanded
function.return: True if the node is expanded, False otherwise
function.description: Check the path (array with pk records values (only single pk key supported)) expanded status
function.summary: Check the path (array with pk records values (only single pk key supported)) expanded status

function.name: refresh
function.description: Refresh the tree display
function.summary: Refresh the tree display

function.name: removeAllColumns
function.description: Remove all columns but the tree column from the tree table
function.summary: Remove all columns but the tree column from the tree table

function.name: removeAllRoots
function.description: Remove all root foundsets
function.summary: Remove all root foundsets

function.name: setCallBackInfo
function.description: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance
function.summary: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance

function.name: setExpandNode
function.description: Expand/collapse the path, array with pk records values (only single pk key supported)
function.summary: Expand/collapse the path, array with pk records values (only single pk key supported)

function.name: setFont
function.description: Sets the specified font as the font of the tree.
function.summary: Sets the specified font as the font of the tree.

function.name: setLocation
function.description: Sets the location of the tree.
function.summary: Sets the location of the tree.

function.name: setMRelationName
function.description: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance
function.summary: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance

function.name: setNRelationName
function.description: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance
function.summary: for compatibility, store this in a compatibility Binding instance

function.name: setNodeLevelVisible
function.description: Set the level of visible nodes (expand or collapse to certain level)
function.summary: Set the level of visible nodes (expand or collapse to certain level)

function.name: setOnDrag
function.description: Set method to be called when a drag is started on the tree. For more details about the method arguments and return value check the same property of a form
function.summary: Set method to be called when a drag is started on the tree.

function.name: setOnDragEnd
function.description: Set method to be called when a drag of on the tree is ended. For more details about the method arguments and return value check the same property of a form
function.summary: Set method to be called when a drag of on the tree is ended.

function.name: setOnDragOver
function.description: Set method to be called during a drag over the tree. For more details about the method arguments and return value check the same property of a form
function.summary: Set method to be called during a drag over the tree.

function.name: setOnDrop
function.description: Set method to be called on a drop on the tree. For more details about the method arguments and return value check the same property of a form
function.summary: Set method to be called on a drop on the tree.

function.name: setRoots
function.description: for compatibility, just call addRoots,createBinding (store in compatibility Bindings instance) with passed info
function.summary: for compatibility, just call addRoots,createBinding (store in compatibility Bindings instance) with passed info

function.name: setRowHeight
function.description: Set row height
function.summary: Set row height

function.name: setSize
function.description: Sets the size of the tree.
function.summary: Sets the size of the tree.

function.name: setTreeColumnHeader
function.description: Set the header text for the tree column
function.summary: Set the header text for the tree column
